author: QDogg
comment: I have a sony sw3 and a sony XZ3 phone if I load watch face on watch at say 1:00 I go back check time on watch it's still shows 1:00 I  load different face on watch reload this one at say 1:30 go back and check after 5 to 10 minutes it still shows 1:30

reply.author: UBR Studios
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. Can you please provide your watch model and your connected device model? I have been unable to duplicate this problem though testing. The watch requests the time from the connected device frequently and it appears that exchange is not happening for you.  Please email details to ubrocked@gmail.com so I can resolve this.

title: Not working properly

author: brodie Yg
comment: Not appearing on lg g watch
title: Not syncing
